title.rendered: MULTIPLE AGENT TACTICAL SENTRY VEHICLE (MATS TRAILER)

content.rendered:
PROUDLY PRESENTING

MULTIPLE AGENT TACTICAL SENTRY VEHICLE (MATS TRAILER)

In December 2004, Dymech Engineering was contracted by the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide four (4) 18 ft., 2-ton, tandem axle, aluminum van body trailers. These trailers were designed and fabricated specifically to the DND purchase description.

A complete and detailed CAD model was created using Pro/E software. This model was used to verify the design with DND, create production drawings and develop the Operator Manuals, Maintenance Manuals and Shop Repair Manuals.

Dymech Engineering developed Operator Manuals, Maintenance Manuals, Parts and Shop Repair Manuals for the Department of National Defence.

In December 2004, Dymech Engineering was contracted by the Department of National Defence (DND) to provide four (4) 18 ft., 2-ton, tandem axle, aluminum van body trailers. These trailers were designed and fabricated specifically to the DND purchase description.
